price: Wͻbεgyegye adamu wᴐ ahennwa a yahyehyε no santen so; na yεde ‘Huur’ (ͻsoro aheman mu mmaa no a) wͻn ani mma akεse-akεse fεfεεfε bεka wͻn ho.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā sururin maṣfūfatin wazawwajnāhum biḥūrin ʿīnin
